data.text: Given the bikes you've been looking at I would recommend the Sonder Frontier either in Rigid fork or suspension, if you can afford it I would go for the Shimano Deore version and avoid the SRAM SX version - I've got the SRAM SX rigid version and had to change both shifter and rear derailleur to SRAM NX now appears to work ok, my review is on the Sonder website which details my issues with the SRAM SX groupset - recent setup that I used for JennRide 2022 below
data.author: Rich Walks Rides

data.text: thanks mate ill definitely have a look.your set up looks great .thanks for the advice.

data.text: Yeah Sram SX is very poor and then jump up to NX and I can’t find any real difference between NX and GX other than weight! I literally couldn’t get the shifting dialled in with SX! Clunky!
